1: I practice integrity and trust and stand firm.
2: I welcome examination that refines my heart and mind.
3: I keep steadfast love in view and walk in truth.
4: I keep company with sincere, truthful people.
5: I keep company with people of integrity and kindness.
6: I keep pure and approach sacred service with integrity
7: I give thanks and celebrate wondrous works
8: I love the place where honor dwells
9: I live among peaceful and just people.
10: Act with integrity; give generously and deal fairly.
11: I live with integrity and receive mercy.
12: I stand secure and give thanks with the community
